TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tamahu, title = Tamahu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tamahu} }

S.FORM: Tamahu Itiniay i Taoyuan Cen no Kaohsiung ko Tamahu a niyaro', 218 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 771 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 708 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 63 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun83%, Rukai2%, Cou1%, Paiwan4%, Tayal1%, Amis1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Tamaho Itiniay i Taoyoan Cen no Kaohsiong ko Tamaho a niyaro', 218 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 771 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 708 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 63 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon83%, Rokai2%, Coo1%, Paiwan4%, Tayal1%, Amis1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
